options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NX_TASK_TARGET_PROJECT=node-dynamic-remote NX_TASK_TARGET_TARGET=build NX_TASK_TARGET_CONFIGURATION=production pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/node-dynamic-remote/webpack.config.js --mode production
